channel.title: How do i make an item overpowerd? 718/742
channel.description: im useing the rune-evo and i cant seem to get the item bonuses to work. it dont give any errors but it dont work ingame. what file do i edit??? i edited data/item/bonuses/23679. the 23679 is lucky armadyl godsword. i changed the bonus to 999 and saved then got ingame and it didnt work. so if anyone knows how to make a item overpowerd please reply
